items.title: Jim Cramer on Goldman Sachs: “There’s a Thirst That Can’t Be Slaked Without More Deals”
items.description: The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (NYSE:GS) is one of the 16 stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer noted that investors who are interested in investing in IPOs can go for GS stock, as he explained: “I’ve tried to be skeptical of these three red hot areas, but as I told you last week, once the […]
